Summary: Teacher tells class her son in the military knows ufo's to be true
divs: Sighting DetailsMy elderly 6th grade teacher Mrs. Walace in Norco Elementary school in California during the school year of 75"-76" had told the whole class (me included)about her son in the military knowing ufo's to be true because he's seen one. Mrs. Walace one school day out of no where started talking about ufo's and whiether they are real or not. Then goings on to mention she has a son in the military that informed her that ufo's are true cause he's seen one the military has. I metioned this to one of my friends Tom Moses a couple years later to see if he remembered what Mrs. Walace said about ufo's being real and he didn't but I still do. So, I doubt others in the class remember it too seeing how so many years have passed. Surely Mrs. Walace died many years ago since she was like 60+ in the 70's. But I figured her son might still be alive with ufo information if only you could locate him. I believe Mrs. Walac only had 1 son so he shouldn't be too hard to find. Good luck.
